Name: Mike the Cat
About the game: Mike the Cat is out and running about , with 5 Different Levels he isnt coming back any time soon . Grab Coins , Hearts and get Points while avoiding Obstacles that move faster the longer you stay alive. Auto-Save keeps track of your Points and Coins Made using Unreal Engine 4.26.2 Scheduled Updates Bi-Weekly ........ Thanks for playing !!!
